name: Squirrel Brooch
description:
A charming squirrel brooch, handmade using an image from a vintage children's story!

This adorable squirrel brooch is made using a picture from a vintage children's story. The illustration has such a charming look, and the black and white are so striking.

This brooch is only an inch high, so is perfect for the lapel of a winter coat of bag. I have a selection of other miniature brooches, which could also look lovely in little clusters!

name: Aqua Teardrop Earrings
description:
These great vintage earrings are a delicate aqua glass. The faceted glass with the teardrop shape looks so beautiful and classic. The gems measure 15mm long and are set in vintage brass settings.

The whole earring measures about an inch (27mm) long and has gold plated French style ear wires. The stones are designed to sit just below the earlobe and are perfect for an understated vintage look.

name: Family Tree Locket
description:
The surface of this beautifully simple brass locket is covered in a geometric scallop, or fishscales, design. The locket folds out to reveal space for four different photos or pictures. 

The locket measures 30mm long by 22mm wide. When clasped together, the pendant is a great, versatile size, which would look equally good worn short or long. The shorter option, at 18" / 46cm, is designed to sit an inch or two below the collar bone on the chest plate. The longer length is 24" / 61cm and is designed to sit at chest level.

From now until Christmas, Â£2 from every Family Tree Locket sold will be donated to Refuge's Christmas Gift Appeal, buying a gift for women and children staying in a refuge over the festive season.

name: Absinthe Green Earrings
description:
These earrings are vintage glass jewels in a lovely fresh, vibrant apple green with unusual flashes of turquoise in certain lights. Each earring is around an inch long and the green stones are designed to sit just below the earlobe.

Each jewel is 10mm long and is set in golden brass settings. The earring hooks are lever style in gold plated brass.

name: Frosted Peach Earrings
description:
These beautiful earrings feature a frosted peach stone, set in golden brass, with a tiny little accent crystal in a delicate apple green at the top. 

The earrings measure 30mm (just over an inch) in length and the stones are designed to sit just below the earlobe.  The ear wires are gold plated brass.  

Any questions, just ask.

name: Another Bee Hive Necklace
description: This necklace features a single vintage brass hexagon to make a honeycomb, with a little brass honey bee, flying away. The honeycomb pendant measures 19mm (3/4 inch) across and the bee is just 10mm long. The necklace chain is 17" long and is designed to be worn short, around the collar bone. If you'd prefer it longer, just let me know.

name: Rainy Day Sphere Locket
description:
This beautifully simple antique locket is a spherical globe that opens up to reveal a muted coral pink coloured inside. The lockets have some great tarnishing from their age which adds to their coolness. I have strung it on a fine antique brass chain that has a very slight, subtle coppery hue that goes perfectly with the locket. Hidden inside is a tiny little brass umbrella charm! A very sweet surprise. The necklace measures around 24" (60cms) so is designed to be worn fairly long. The diameter of the locket is 19mm. Getting married?
I can supply these lockets for your bridal party. Contact me if you're interested.

name: Oversized Vintage Locket
description: This beautifully simple locket features a subtle checkerboard etching on the front and back, and is inlaid with some beautiful rosy copper detailing. The locket is vintage, so has a bit of tarnishing and maybe a couple of tiny age spots! I think it makes it even more fabulous. The locket is large, measuring two inches long. The length of the chain is about 29" so is designed to be worn long, well below the chest. If you want it made longer or shorter, just message me.

name: Industrial Triangle Earrings
description:
These great earrings are vintage brass triangles with a intricate geometric circle detail. The brass is very fine and has tarnished through time to a deep gold colour. 

I have added co-ordinating ear wires in antique gold. The triangles measure 40mm (an inch and a half) long and are designed to sit just below the ear lobes.

name: Teal Industrial Necklace
description: This great necklace features a row of little delicate vintage glass beads in a rich turquoise or teal blue shade, contrasted with vintage metal bars and darkened antique metal chain. I love the greenish blue with the dark bronze shades. The beads are just 7mm across, and the chain is fairly fine and delicate. The necklace measures about 20" so is designed to sit above the chest. If you'd like it made shorter or longer, just let me know. Check out my other industrial necklaces.

name: Hummingbird Earrings
description: These great stud earrings feature a charming vintage illustration of a hummingbird, sealed behind a glass dome. The earrings measure half an inch (12mm) across and are set into antique bronze settings.

name: Frosted Turquoise Earrings
description:
These beautiful earrings feature a vintage glass stone in frosted turquoise, with a smaller apple green accent stone above.  

The stones are set in vintage brass and have lever style earrings in gold plated brass.  

The length of the earring is 30mm (just over an inch) and the stones are designed to sit just below the earlobe.

name: Tiffany Royal Blue Studs
description:
These beautiful little stud earrings have crystals that are a great opaque royal blue colour and are set in tiffany style brass settings.

The studs measure 8mm across and have gold plated posts and backs.

name: Deco Fan Earrings in Ice Blue
description: These beautiful vintage earrings are in an art deco modernist style, with five little opal glass gems set in a simple fan shape. The brass settings are tarnished to a great bronze shade, which brings out the delicate ice blue opal sheen perfectly. These earrings measure around 50mm (two inches) long. I have added perfectly co-ordinating ear wires in antique bronze. Also available in other colours.

name: Bee Locket
description: This adorable and highly detailed locket features a little bumble bee that's been treated to bring out great verdigris tones of green and turquoise. The locket is vintage brass that's tarnished over time to a great antique gold colour. The locket measures 30mm across. The locket chain is 25" long so is designed to be worn fairly long. If you'd prefer it longer or shorter,

name: Peach and Turquoise Jewel Earrings
description:
These earrings feature a teardrop shaped vintage glass crystal in a peachy pink shade, accented with a wonderfully clashy turquoise gem on top.  The stones are set in antiqued brass with coordinating earwires.  

The earrings are 30mm long and are designed to be worn just below the earlobe.

name: Cornflower Teardop Earrings
description: These great vintage earrings are a milky cornflower blue glass. The delicate opaque glass has a very subtle violet tinge and look so beautiful and classic. The gems measure 12mm long and are set in vintage brass settings. The whole earring measures about an inch (27mm) long and has gold plated French style ear wires. The stones are designed to sit just below the earlobe and are perfect for an understated vintage look. Like this? Then check out some of my other teardrop earrings.

name: Fox Locket
description:
This beautiful vintage necklace is made from an antique brass locket and running fox charm. The brass locket has a beautifully tarnished patina in a rich conker shade. The inside is still bright gold! The bronze, gold brass tones go brilliantly together for an authentic vintage look.

The locket measures around 25mm (an inch) across. The chain measures 24" and is designed to be worn fairly long. If you'd like it made shorter or longer, just message me.

name: Turkish Delight Earrings
description:
These beautiful vintage glass gems are a deepest pink - almost red - shade and are set in golden brass settings, which co-ordinate perfectly. I have added a pair of matching gold plated ear wires with a lever fastening. 

The gems are made from vintage glass, measure around 12mm long and the length of these earrings are about 25mm (an inch). Perfect for an understated vintage look.

name: French Navy Earrings
description:
These classic earrings are made with vintage glass stones in a beautiful smokey, French Navy shade. They have a lovely, chunky round stone! 

The stones are set in darkened brass settings, with perfectly matching earrings. The length of each earring is about 30mm (just over an inch) long. The stones are 12mm (half an inch) across.

name: A Bee Hive Necklace
description:
This necklace features a single vintage brass hexagon to make a honeycomb, with a little bee charm inside. 

The honeycomb pendant measures 19mm (under one inche) across and the bee is just 10mm long. The necklace chain is 17" long and is designed to sit on the collar bone.

name: Red Velvet Earrings
description:
These beautifully opulent looking earrings feature two vintage glass jewels - one in matte red, which has an almost velvety finish, and a rich royal blue accent stone.  They remind me of Snow White! 

Each earring measures 30mm (just over an inch) and has antique brass settings and earwires.

name: Fool's Gold Earrings
description:
These pieces of Fool's Gold have been cut with clean, sharp lines on some sides, while others have been left uncut and natural for a great contrast of textures. The pyrite has a beautiful metallic sheen that glows gold when it catches the light. 

Each nugget is about 15mm and the length of the whole earrings is about 50mm (two inches). The earrings are gold plated.

name: Robin Brooch
description:
This cute little brooch is made from a vintage drawing of a robin red breast from a vintage christmas card! I have encapsulated it under a dome of glass before framing in a brass lace edged setting.

The brooch measures just 28mm high by 18mm wide.

name: Red Star Earrings
description: These great star stud earrings are genuine 1970s vintage stock, in a beautiful glossy scarlet or cherry red shade. A perfect understated vintage accessory! Each earring measures just 8mm at its widest points, and has steel posts and butterfly backs. Also available in other colours.

name: Plain Vintage Locket
description:
This beautifully simple locket features a subtle checkerboard etching on the front and back, and is inlaid with some beautiful rosy copper detailing. 

The locket is vintage, so has a bit of tarnishing and maybe a couple of age spots! I think it makes it even more fabulous. 

The locket measures 30mm across. The length of the chain is about 20". If you want it made longer or shorter, just message me.

name: Purple Heart Earrings
description: These adorable little earrings are little vintage glass hearts in an amethyst purple shade. They are set in antique brass settings with perfectly coordinating ear wires. Each heart is just half an inch long and is designed to dangle just below the earlobe.

name: Pigeon Brooch
description:
This charming little brooch is made from a vintage illustration of a pigeon. I have encapsulated it under a dome of glass before framing in a brass lace edged setting.

The brooch measures just 28mm high by 18mm wide. They look great on their own or in little clusters, so check out my other tiny brooches.

name: Tiffany Turquoise Studs
description:
These beautiful little stud earrings have crystals that are a great opaque turquoise blue colour.  They are set in tiffany style brass settings.

The studs measure 8mm across and have gold plated posts and backs.

name: Pink Opal Glow Earrings
description: These great vintage earrings are a milky opal glass with a pink sheen that glows when the light catches them. They are really beautiful! The gems measure 12mm long and are set in darkened brass settings. The whole earring measures just over an inch (30mm) long and has antique gold French style ear wires.

name: Labrador Dog Locket
description:
This very cool necklace features an antique brass locket with a dark tarnished patina, and a little golden labrador dog charm in a co-ordinating brass gold.

The locket is 30mm across with a perfectly working clasp. It's finished with some thick chain in antique brass with a lobster clasp.

name: Icy Moonstone Earrings
description:
The delicate shades in these vintage jewel earrings are just beautiful! A milky moonstone, which takes on a pink glow when it catches the light, is accented with a pale sapphire blue crystal on top.

They come with gold plated brass earwires and settings, and measure just under one inch in length.

name: Pink Opal Earrings
description:
These fabulous earrings feature a teardrop shaped vintage glass opal in golden brass setting.  They have a milky, opal pink sheen that glows bright when the light hits them.  They really are stunning.  

The earrings are gold plated brass and has a secure lever back fastening.  

Each earring measures around 30mm (just over an inch) in length, so nice and versatile.

name: Green Star Earrings
description: These great star stud earrings are genuine 1970s vintage stock, in a beautiful dark green shade, with speckles of glitter. A perfect understated vintage accessory! Each earring measures just 8mm at its widest points, and has steel posts and butterfly backs. Also available in other colours.

name: Heart Earrings
description: These lovely little stud earrings are made from vintage brass stampings. Each tiny heart measures just 7mm at its widest point. The earring posts are gold plated.

name: Turquoise Star Earrings
description: These great star stud earrings are genuine 1970s vintage stock, in a beautiful glossy turquoise or sea green shade. A perfect understated vintage accessory! Each earring measures just 8mm at its widest points, and has steel posts and butterfly backs. Also available in other colours.

name: Fox Brooch
description:
This little scampering fox is a vintage brass stamping that's been painted with black and golden paint for a cool vintage patina.

The fox is measures well under two inches (40mm) across, from nose to tail. He's tiny!

name: Yellow Star Earrings
description: These lovely little star stud earrings are vintage stock from the 1970s. They are enameled with a delicate buttermilk yellow. Each earring measures just 8mm at its widest points, and has steel posts and butterfly backs. Also available in other colours.

name: Blue Chintz Earrings
description:
These tiny delicate little stud earrings feature a chintzy rose design on royal blue glass cabochons. The detail is exquisite, given their size! They are vintage Japanese from the 1950s.  

They measure only 7mm across and have gold plated ear posts.

name: Turquoise Flower Stud Earrings
description:
These beautiful stud earrings are made from vintage turquoise glass, with intricate flower detail picked out with touches of gold paint. 

Each earring measures just a fraction under 1cm across and has gold plated ear posts.

name: Turquoise Moonstone Earrings
description:
These great vintage stud earrings are cloudy turquoise glass stones in antique copper settings. They have a really beautiful iridescent, moonstone effect.

They measure around 8mm across and have gold plated earring posts and backs.

name: Coral Pearl Earrings
description:
These great drop earrings are a classic 1940s glass pearl in a teardrop shape, teamed with a sweet little coral stone. The rich cream and coral colours look great together. 

The earrings measure about an inch (25mm) long and are designed to sit just below the earlobe.

name: Turquoise Pearl Earrings
description:
These great drop earrings are a classic 1940s glass pearl in a teardrop shape, teamed with a sweet little Chalcedony stone in a soft turquoise or seafoam shade. The rich cream and turquoise colours look great together. 

The earrings measure about an inch (25mm) long and are designed to sit just below the earlobe. 

The ear wires are gold plated brass.

name: Red Deco Earrings
description:
These great tomato red earrings are two diamond shaped stones set in golden brass. I have added gold plated brass ear wires. 

The earrings measure around 30mm (just over an inch) long and the drops will sit just below your earlobe

name: Turquoise Acorn Earrings
description:
These beautiful acorn earrings are made from a pearl with an antique copper bead cap. The tones of the tarnished red copper with the rich opaque turquoise shade of the pearl look great together. I have added some co-ordinating copper ear wires. 

The length of the earring is about 30mm (just over an inch) long.

name: Frosted Peach Jewel Earrings
description:
These beautiful little vintage glass stones are a frosted peachy pink colour and are set in vintage golden brass settings. They have French style lever back earrings and the length of the whole earring is around 25mm (an inch).

The stones are 11mm long.

Any questions, just ask.

name: Lilac Jewel Earrings
description:
These vintage jewel earrings feature an oval crackled glass opal on the bottom in a beautifully delicate lilac shade.  It is accented with a tiny little glass crystal in a pale sapphire blue.  

The length of the earring is 30mm (just over an inch) and has gold plated brass earwires.

name: Scalloped Deco Necklace
description:
This beautifully simple necklace features three semi-circular brass scallops, with Deco style detailing, strung together with simple gold chain.  The brass is vintage and has mellowed slightly in colour to a beautiful rich gold.  

The pendant width is about 60mm (just over two inches) and the necklace is 20 inches long.

name: Deco Shape Necklace
description:
This great necklace features an antique brass stamping in distinctive Deco sunburst shape, with two little diamonds at either side.  

The width of the pendant is about 60mm (just over two inches) and the length of the necklace is 20 inches.  The pendant is designed to be worn on the breastplate, below the collarbone.

name: Light Sapphire Jewel Earrings
description:
These beautiful little vintage glass stones are a delicate pale sapphire blue colour and are set in vintage golden brass settings. They have French style lever back earrings and the length of the whole earring is around 30mm (just over an inch).

The stones are 12mm long.

name: White Opal Jewel Earrings
description:
These beautiful little vintage glass stones are a cloudy white opal colour and are set in vintage golden brass settings. They have French style lever back earrings and the length of the whole earring is around 30mm (just over an inch).

The stones are 12mm long.

name: Thistle Earrings
description:
These cute stud or post earrings are made from a vintage drawing of a thistle from old botanical prints. I have encapsulated them under a dome of glass before framing in an antique brass setting. The detail on the thistles is beautiful, especially given their size!

Each earring measures 12mm across. I also have this thistle illustration available as a little brooch, so do check out my other designs.

name: Royal Blue Earrings
description:
These classic earrings are made with vintage glass stones in a beautiful, deep royal blue shade. They have a lovely, chunky round stone!

The stones are set in golden brass settings, with perfectly matching gold plated earrings. The length of each earring is about 30mm (just over an inch) long. The stones themselves are just 12mm (about half an inch) across.

name: Starburst Earrings
description:
These great earrings are made from a row of little metallic hematite stars, teamed with a gold plated ear wires. The earrings measure around two inches (50mm) long.

Each star varies between 8mm and 5mm across.

name: Verdigris Swallow Brooch
description: This little vintage swallow bird brooch is a vintage brass stamping that has been treated and painted to bring out a gorgeous verdigris patina, with varying shades of turquoise, green and gold. No two are the same! Perfect for dresses, coats, jumpers or bags. The bird measures 48mm by 25mm at its widest points. Like this? Check out my antique gold version.

name: Pink Stick Earrings
description:
These beautifully simple and understated earrings feature a vintage brass stick with a chalcedon bead in a delicate peachy pink shade.

The brass stick measures 30mm (just over an inch) in length, and the length of the whole earring is 45mm (just under two inches). The earrings are gold plated.

Any questions, just ask.

name: Egyptian Deco Earrings
description:
These gorgeous earrings are in geometric triangles with little ribbed dome detail. The brass triangles vintage, and have a simple, art deco geometric look.

The length of the whole earring is around 50mm (two inches) and the earring is designed to end around the jawline. The ear wires are gold plated brass.

name: Silver Moonstone Earrings
description:
The cool grey and icy blue shades in these vintage jewel earrings are just beautiful!  A grey blue moonstone, which takes on a delicate glow when it catches the light, is accented with a pale citrine yellow crystal on top.  

They come with silver plated earwires and settings and measure just under one inch in length.

name: Simple Star Earrings
description: These great earrings feature a tiny little vintage brass star, teamed with a simple length of gold plated chain. The length of the whole earring is around 50mm (two inches) and the ear wire is gold plated brass.

name: Watermelon Earrings
description:
These great earrings combine a deep green colour with a little crystal accent stone in hot pink at the top.  

The green stones have hints of rich blue too, which come out when they catch the light.  It's hard to explain, but I have tried to capture it in the second photograph! 

The earrings are 30mm long and have gold plated earwires with a lever fastening.

name: Aztec Triangle Earrings
description:
I have made these great earrings from Southwestern style gold plated triangles, with a cool chevron design, and gold plated chain to create a modern shape.

The earrings measure about 55mm (just over two inches) long and have gold plated earring wires. Any questions, just ask.

name: Hot Pink & Blue Industrial Necklace
description: This great necklace features a row of little delicate chalcedony beads in a vibrant royal blue shade, with a neon pink bead for contrast. The beads are teamed with vintage metal bars and darkened antique metal chain. I love the fresh colours with the dark bronze shades. Each bead is just 7mm across, and the chain is fairly fine and delicate. The necklace measures about 20" so is designed to sit above the chest. If you'd like it made shorter or longer, just let me know. Check out my other industrial necklaces.

name: Royal Blue Star Earrings
description: These great earrings feature a tiny little vintage brass star, teamed with a single Royal blue bead on a length of gold plated chain. The length of the whole earring is around 50mm (two inches) and the ear wire is gold plated brass.

name: Hot Pink Star Earrings
description: These great earrings feature a tiny little vintage brass star, teamed with a single hot pink glass bead on a length of gold plated chain. The length of the whole earring is around 50mm (two inches) and the ear wire is gold plated brass.

name: Turquoise & Coral Industrial Necklace
description: This great necklace features a row of little delicate angelite beads in a milky turquoise shade, with a single coral pink bead for contrast. The beads are teamed with vintage metal bars and darkened antique metal chain. I love the fresh colours with the dark bronze shades. Each bead is just 7mm across, and the chain is fairly fine and delicate. The necklace measures about 20" so is designed to sit above the chest. If you'd like it made shorter or longer, just let me know. I also have other industrial necklaces.

name: Best Friends Necklaces
description:
This great vintage pendant is a brass heart, split into two, with 'Best Friends' engraved on it. Such a charming, nostalgic idea!

Each of the necklace chains are 18 inches so are designed to be worn fairly short, just below the collar bone. I can adjust the length if you like. The chains are antique brass and the brass of the pendants themselves have tarnished over time to a lovely rich bronzed colour.

Each half of the pendant will come in a little gift box, perfect for your BFF ;)

name: Seafoam Star Earrings
description: These great earrings feature a tiny little vintage brass star, teamed with a single turquoise chalcedony bead on a length of gold plated chain. The length of the whole earring is around 50mm (two inches) and the ear wire is gold plated brass.

name: More Triangle Arrow Earrings
description:
These beautifully simple geometric earrings feature golden trianges hung in a line. The triangles are vintage brass stampings, that have mellowed with age to a great deep bronzed gold colour. I have added bronze ear wires.

The length of the whole earring is over two inches (about 60mm). Any questions, just ask.

name: Turquoise Earrings
description:
These classic earrings are made with vintage glass stones in a beautiful fresh, opaque sky blue shade. They have a lovely, chunky round stone!

The stones are set in golden brass settings, with perfectly matching gold plated earrings. The length of each earring is about 30mm (just over an inch) long. The stones themselves are just 12mm (about half an inch) across.

name: Coral Stick Earrings
description:
These beautifully simple and understated earrings feature a vintage brass stick with a chalcedon bead in a coral pink, or flamingo, shade.

The brass stick measures 30mm (just over an inch) in length, and the length of the whole earring is 45mm (just under two inches). The earrings are gold plated.

Any questions, just ask.

name: Apple Green Teardrop Earrings
description: These beautiful earrings are vintage glass in an apple green colour. They are pear shaped and set in vintage brass settings with French style ear wires. The gems measure 15mm long and the length of the whole earring is about 30mm (just over an inch). The gems are designed to sit just below the earlobe, and the ear wires are gold plated brass. Like this? Then check out some of my other teardrop earrings.

name: Pink & Blue Industrial Necklace
description:
This great necklace features a row of little delicate angelite beads in a milky, peachy pink shade, with a single royal blue bead for contrast. The beads are teamed with vintage metal bars and darkened antique metal chain. I love the fresh colours with the dark bronze shades.

Each bead is just 7mm across, and the chain is fairly fine and delicate. The necklace measures about 20" so is designed to sit above the chest. If you'd like it made shorter or longer, just let me know.

name: Blue Stick Earrings
description:
These beautifully simple and understated earrings feature a vintage brass stick with a lapis bead in a vibrant royal blue shade.

The brass stick measures 30mm (just over an inch) in length, and the length of the whole earring is 45mm (just under two inches). The earrings are gold plated.

name: Heart Necklace
description:
This adorable necklace chain is made up of lots of tiny hearts, with a triple heart pendant in the centre. The chain is made of solid brass, with a subtle pinkish coppery hue.

It's very delicate, with each of the little hearts measuring around 5mm across. The necklace measures 17" and is designed to sit around the collar bone.

name: Deco Opal Earrings
description:
These fabulous earrings feature two diamond-shaped vintage glass opals in golden brass settings. They have a milky, opal pink sheen that glows bright when the light hits them. They really are stunning, and I love the geometric, art deco shape.

The earrings are gold plated brass.

Each earring measures around 30mm (just over an inch) in length, so nice and versatile

name: Chrysler Earrings
description:
These fabulous earrings are vintage brass in a distinctive but classic Art Deco shape.  They remind me of the Chrysler Building! 

The earrings are solid brass and have gold plated brass ear posts.  The length of the whole earring is about three inches (75mm).

name: Seafoam Teardrop Earrings
description: These great earrings are vintage glass stones in a rounded teardrop shape. They are a beautiful opaque milky turquoise, or seafoam, colour with golden brass settings. The stones measure just under 20mm long and have a lovely chunkiness. The length of the whole earring is 35mm and the stones are designed to sit just below the earlobe. Like this? Then check out some of my other teardrop earrings.

name: Navy Heart Earrings
description:
These delicate vintage earrings are glass love hearts in French Navy shade, set in antique brass.  They have co-ordinating earrings. 

The gems measure just 10mm across and are designed to sit just below the earlobe.  The length of the whole earring is about 20mm.

name: Pop Art Earrings
description:
The striking combination of cherry red and chalk white in these vintage stones reminds me of Sixties pop art.  The stones are vintage glass and are set in brass settings.

The length of the earrings are two inches (50mm), and they're 13mm wide. They have a nice chunky quality to them.  

The ear wires are gold plated brass.

name: Old Dog Brooch
description:
This vintage brass dog has got the funniest expression on his face.  I couldn't resist it! 

The brass dates to the 1950s and measures about two inches (50mm) across.  There is a lovely, almost coppery patina that's developed over the years.  A really quirky and charming little brooch!

name: Octopus Earrings
description:
These great stud earrings feature stylised octopuses in black and white! They are set in tarnished dark brass and protected between a glass dome.

Each earring measures 12mm across. Any questions, just ask.

name: Seafoam Drop Earrings
description:
These great earrings feature two drops in a milky, seafoam turquoise shade.  The stones are vintage glass and are set in brass settings. 

The length of the earrings are two inches (50mm), and they're 13mm wide.  They have a nice chunky quality to them, and a very classic, flattering colour.  I love them!   

The ear wires are gold plated brass.

name: Rabbit Earrings
description: These great earrings feature a vintage image of two rabbits or hares, set behind a little glass dome. The focals measure half an inch (12mm) across and are set into antique bronze settings. These are stud or post earrings.

name: Rabbit Brooch
description:
This great little brooch features a vintage illustration of a bunny rabbit in a garden. The image comes from a children's story book from the fifties and is very charming.

It's encapsulated under a dome of clear resin and set in a gold lace edged frame / setting.

Measures 28mm high and 18mm wide.

name: Diamond Bunting Necklace
description:
This super cool necklace is made from little darkened antique brass diamonds strung together to make a bunting or lace style.

It looks brilliant on, and measures around 18" so is designed to sit on or around the collarbone.

name: Geometric Pyramid Necklace
description: This great necklace is made from a very simple vintage brass charm with a stylised art deco style pyramid. The brass has mellowed slightly with age to a rich golden colour. I have added vintage brass chain. The focal measures about 40mm (an inch and a half) across. The necklace measures 22" long and is designed to sit below the collar bone. Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric or deco jewellery.

name: Smaller Deco Drop Earrings
description:
These great earrings are solid brass and feature a graduated art deco design. Very simple and classic.

The earrings measure 30mm (just over an inch) in length and have gold plated earrings.

name: Geometric Triangle Necklace
description: This great necklace is made from a very simple vintage brass charm with three geometric triangles. The brass has mellowed slightly with age to a rich golden colour. I have added gold plated chain. The focal measures about 25mm (an inch) across. The necklace measures 22" long and is designed to sit below the collar bone. Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric designs.

name: More Firestone Earrings
description:
These great vintage earrings are glass opal in milky pink that glow bright when the light hits them. They have tiny flecks of red, blue, turquoise and green and look really brilliant.

They measure 8mm across and are domed. The earrings posts and backs are gold plated.

name: Deco Triangle Earrings with Jet
description:
These gorgeous earrings are in geometric triangles with little jet black glass domes set in. They look great - geometric in a vintage, art deco kind of way.

The black glass stones measure 7mm across. The length of the whole earring is around 65mm (two and a half inches). The ear wires are gold plated brass.

Any questions, just ask.

name: Another Pink Opal Ring
description:
This beautiful vintage glass stone has a milky opal white sheen that glows bright pink, gold and blue when caught in the light.

It's set in an antique gold setting with a perfectly co-ordinating adjustable ring.

The stone measures 15mm round.

name: Siamese Cat Brooch
description:
This vintage brooch features a lovely little Siamese cat's face. I love it! It's made from vintage glass and I have set it in a antique bronze lace edged setting.

The brooch measures 42mm high and 32mm wide.

name: Industrial Teardrop Earrings
description:
These beautifully modern earrings are fine vintage brass stampings in a teardrop shape with diagonal stripes inside. The detail is fantastic.

The earrings are a deep gold coloured brass, and I have added perfectly co-ordinating French style ear wires. The teardrops are around 30mm (just over an inch) long and the length of the whole earring is 50mm (two inches).

name: Industrial Circle Earrings
description:
These beautifully modern earrings are fine vintage brass stampings in a circular shape with decreasing arcs inside. The detail is fantastic.

The earrings are a deep gold coloured brass, and I have added perfectly co-ordinating French style ear wires. The circles are around 20mm (just under an inch) across and the length of the whole earring is 35mm (an inch and a half).

name: Cornflower Industrial Necklace
description:
This great necklace features a row of little delicate angelite beads in a milky powder or cornflower blue shade, contrasted with vintage metal bars and darkened antique metal chain. I love the milky blue with the dark bronze shades.

The beads are just 7mm across, and the chain is fairly fine and delicate. The necklace measures about 20" so is designed to sit above the chest. 

Check out my other <a href="http://www.silkpursesowsear.com/products?search=industrial+necklace">industrial necklaces<a>.

name: Anchor Earrings
description: These great earrings feature a vintage image of an anchor, set behind a little glass dome. The focals measure half an inch (12mm) across and are set into antique bronze settings. These are stud or post earrings.

name: Industrial V Necklace
description:
This necklace is made from vintage brass that's mellowed over time to a deep, golden patina.  The three dimensional 'V' pendant is teamed with brass bars and chain for a modern, industrial shape.  

The necklace measures about 20" long, so is designed to sit well below the collar bone.  If you'd like it made shorter, just let me know.

name: Bicycle Earrings
description: These great earrings feature a vintage image of a bicycle, set behind a little glass dome. The focals measure half an inch (12mm) across and are set into antique bronze settings. These are stud or post earrings.

name: Heart Sphere Locket
description:
This beautifully simple antique locket is a spherical globe that opens up to reveal a muted coral pink coloured inside. The lockets have some great tarnishing from their age which adds to their coolness. I have strung it on a fine antique brass chain that has a very slight, subtle coppery hue that goes perfectly with the locket. Hidden inside is a tiny little brass love heart! A very sweet surprise. The necklace measures around 24" (60cms) so is designed to be worn fairly long. The diameter of the locket is 19mm. Getting married?
I can supply these lockets for your bridal party. Contact me if you're interested.

name: Another Rabbit Brooch
description:
This little scampering rabbit is a vintage copper stamping. It's very old, probably dating back to the Forties and is very cute!

The brooch measures approximately 40mm across and has a gold plated brooch clasp.

name: Another Bunting Necklace
description: This super cool necklace is made from little vintage brass triangles strung together to make bunting. It looks brilliant on, and measures around 18" so is designed to sit on or around the collarbone. Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric designs.

name: Dove Locket
description:
This beautiful necklace features a genuine vintage brass locket that's tarnished to a beautiful dark bronze patina. I have added a little vintage brass dove with an olive sprig in his beak. The golden bass contrasts brilliantly with the dark gold locket. The locket measures 25mm across. The necklace chain is a co-ordinating bronze, measures 24" and is designed to be worn fairly long. Getting married?
I can supply these lockets for your bridal party. Contact me if you're interested.

name: Constellation Necklace
description:
This great necklace features three vintage brass stars that have tarnished over time to a great, antique gold or bronze. They are positioned asymetrically on a coordinating antique gold chain. 

The length of the chain is 19", so it's designed to sit below the collar bone, on the chest.

name: Love Locket
description:
This lovely locket is solid vintage brass with a solid copper heart. Inside is space for a picture, and another tiny little copper heart. A sweet little surprise. The locket comes with a red brass chain which co-ordinates with the copper detail perfectly. The locket size is just 20mm (under an inch) across, a perfect dainty size for wearing all the time! The locket chain is 18". Getting married?
I can supply these lockets for your bridal party. Contact me if you're interested.

name: Western Horse Necklace
description:
This great necklace features a beautifully detailed and realistic horse head, set inside a horseshoe. The pendant is vintage and made of a beautiful rosy copper.

The chain is also vintage and is a combination of thick, textured copper with a finer red brass at the top. The chain measures around 18" long.

name: Stag Head Brooch
description:
A great vintage brooch, featuring a vintage illustration of a stag's head with antlers.  It's encapsulated under a dome of clear glass and set in a vintage gold lace-edged setting.

Measures 42mm high and 32mm wide.

Any questions, just ask.

name: Star Sphere Locket
description:
This beautifully simple antique locket is a spherical globe that opens up to reveal a muted coral pink coloured inside. The lockets have some great tarnishing from their age which adds to their coolness. I have strung it on a fine antique brass chain that has a very slight, subtle coppery hue that goes perfectly with the locket. Hidden inside is a tiny little brass star! A very sweet surprise. The necklace measures around 24" (60cms) so is designed to be worn fairly long. The diameter of the locket is 19mm. Getting married?
I can supply these lockets for your bridal party. Contact me if you're interested.

name: Love Dove Locket
description:
This is a heart shaped vintage brass locket that's tarnished slightly with age to a wonderful mellow gold with little age spots. The outside has a really subtle pattern etched into it. The inside has inlaid copper detail. And it's nice and big - it measures about 40mm across. 

Inside each locket is a tiny little vintage dove with an olive sprig in his beak. Such a sweet surprise! 

The chain is vintage brass and is 28" so this necklace is designed to be worn long.

name: Another Sort of Bunting Necklace
description: This super cool necklace is made from little vintage brass triangles strung together to make bunting. Each little triangle is 15mm along the edge. It looks brilliant on, and measures around 18" so is designed to sit on or around the collarbone. Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric designs.

name: Swallow Studs
description: These great stud earrings are tiny little brass swallows! Each earring measures 17mm across, from beak to tail, and has a gold plated earring post.

name: Sphere Locket
description:
This beautifully simple antique locket is a spherical globe that opens up to reveal a muted coral pink coloured inside. I have strung it on an fine antique gold chain. The necklace measures around 24" (60cms) so is designed to be worn fairly long. Getting married?
I can supply these lockets for your bridal party. Contact me if you're interested.

name: Seafoam Industrial Necklace
description:
This great necklace features a row of little delicate chalcedony beads in a milky turquoise or seafoam shade, contrasted with vintage metal bars and darkened antique metal chain. I love the milky turquoise with the dark bronze shades.

The beads are just 7mm across, and the chain is fairly fine and delicate. The necklace measures about 20" so is designed to sit above the chest.

I also have other <a href="http://www.silkpursesowsear.com/products?search=industrial+necklace">industrial necklaces<a>.

name: U R My Deer
description:
This little vintage charm is a heart shape with 'U R My Deer' stamped with a deer's or stag's head. This design is on both sides of the heart.

The pendant is made of vintage brass. It's tarnished, so I have teamed it with a fine antique brass chain. The necklace measures around 18" long.

name: Copper Butterfly Necklace
description:
This great necklace is made with a vintage copper stamping of a butterfly dating back to the 1940s. The pendant is teamed with thick, textured vintage copper chain in the same beautiful deep reddish orange tone.

The butterfly measures 40mm (about an inch and a half) wide. The necklace measures about 20" long and is designed to sit on the chest, below the collar bone.

name: Another Copper Swallow Locket
description:
This beautiful necklace features a genuine vintage brass locket that's tarnished to a beautiful dark bronze patina. I have added a little vintage copper swallow in flight that contrasts brilliantly with the dark gold locket. The locket measures 25mm across. The necklaace chain is a co-ordinating red brass, measures 24" and is designed to be worn fairly long. Getting married?
I can supply these lockets for your bridal party. Contact me if you're interested.

name: Rainbow Necklace
description:
This great necklace features a spectrum of seven little glass crystal beads, making a rainbow pendant.  Each of the colours is just 6mm across, and the length of the whole pendant is about 40mm (an inch and a half).  

The necklace chain is vintage brass and measures 18" long.

name: A Horse Locket
description:
This beautiful vintage necklace is made from a genuine vintage brass locket and charm. The locket has tarnished over time to a rich bronzed brown, and the inside of the locket is still bright gold. The bronze and brass tones go brilliantly together. 

The locket measures 25mm (an inch) across. The chain measures about 25" and is designed to be worn fairly long.

name: Cornflower Stick Earrings
description:
These beautifully simple and understated earrings feature a vintage brass stick with a chalcedon bead in a delicate powder blue shade.

The brass stick measures 30mm (just over an inch) in length, and the length of the whole earring is 45mm (just under two inches). The earrings are gold plated.

name: Another Bee Locket
description:
This adorable and highly detailed locket features a vintage honey bee in deep golden brass. The locket is also vintage brass that's tarnished over time to a great antique gold colour. The locket is great quality and is inlaid with copper - a really lovely detail. There is space for two photos and the clasp works perfectly.

The locket measures 50mm (two inches) long, so great size for a statement!

The locket chain is 28" long so is designed to be worn long, below the chest.

name: Blue Bud Earrings
description: These lovely little stud earrings feature vintage porcelain with a beautifully detailed rosebud in deep blue. They measure just 7mm (0.25 inches) across and have gold plated posts.

name: Neon Block Earrings in Yellow
description: These great summery earrings feature vintage brass rods combined with a handmade ceramic bead, that's been painted and glazed with neon yellow paint for a bright, modern and geometric design. The ear wires are gold plated. The length of the whole earring is about 65mm long (nearly three inches) and the ceramic blocks are 10mm across. Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric or neon jewellery.

name: Etched Heart Locket
description:
The title says it all, really. This is a heart shaped vintage brass locket that's tarnished with age to a wonderful mellow gold with little age spots. The outside has a really subtle pattern etched into it. The inside has inlaid copper detail. And it's nice and big - it measures about 40mm across.

The chain is vintage brass and is 28" so this necklace is designed to be worn long.

name: Tiny Triangle Earrings
description: These lovely little stud earrings are vintage brass stampings. Each triangle measures just 8mm at its widest point. The earring posts are gold plated.

name: Star Earrings
description: These lovely little stud earrings are vintage brass stampings. Each tiny star measures just 7mm at its widest point. The earring posts are gold plated.

name: Bee Hive Necklace
description:
This necklace features a trio of vintage brass hexagons to make a honeycomb shape, with a little bee charm.

The honeycomb pendant measures 40mm (under two inches) across and the bee is just 10mm long. The necklace chain is 20" long and is designed to sit on the chest plate, below the collar bone.

name: Turquoise Stick Earrings
description:
These beautifully simple and understated earrings feature a vintage brass stick with a chalcedon bead in a delicate milky turquoise, or seafoam, shade.

The brass stick measures 30mm (just over an inch) in length, and the length of the whole earring is 45mm (just under two inches). The earrings are gold plated.

name: Japanese Rose Studs in Blue
description:
These little stud earrings are made from little vintage Japanese cabochons from the 40s, decorated with yellow, blue and gold flowers. The detail is quite exquisite, given their size!

Each earring has been made from quality gold plated posts, and butterfly back.

The earrings measure 10mm round.

name: Turquoise Drop Earrings
description:
These great earrings feature a faceted turquoise stone in a teardrop, with classic French style gold plated earrings. This turquoise is such a beautiful and flattering colour, and the earrings are designed so they sit just below the earlobe.

The stones measure 18mm long and the length of the whole earring is 33mm (just under an inch and a half).

name: Japanese Rose Studs in Pink
description:
These little stud earrings are made from tiny vintage cabochons from Japan, decorated with yellow, pink and gold flowers. The detail is quite exquisite, given their size!

Each earring has been made from quality gold plated posts, and butterfly back.

The earrings measure 10mm round.

name: Deco Drop Earrings
description: These great earrings are solid brass and feature a graduated art deco design. Very simple and classic. The earrings measure 30mm (just over an inch) in length and have gold plated earrings. Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric or deco jewellery.

name: Bunting Necklace
description: This super cool necklace is made from little vintage brass triangles strung together to make bunting. It looks brilliant on, and measures around 18" so is designed to sit on or around the collarbone. Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric designs.

name: Pink Firestone Studs
description:
These great vintage earrings are glass opal in milky pink that glow bright when the light hits them.

They measure 8mm across and are set in vintage brass settings. The earrings posts and backs are gold plated.

Any questions, just ask.

name: Seafoam Triangle Earrings
description:
These great earrings are milky turquoise, or duck egg blue, glass triangles with gold plated earrings. The edges of the triangles have been picked out in mustard gold paint for a great contrast.

Each earring measures two inches (50mm) long and the triangles are about 12mm long. Lovely, dainty and understated.

name: Big Horse Locket
description:
This quirky horse locket is made from a vintage brass locket and charm. The locket is genuine vintage and has tarnished to a beautiful bronze colour. The horse is a vintage brass stamping with some excellent detail!

The locket is large, measuring around 40mm across and 70mm long. The chain measures 28" and is designed to be worn long, below the chest.

name: Bright Yellow Earrings
description:
These great earrings are vintage opaque glass stones in a bright neon yellow, set in golden brass settings. I have added gold plated earrings.

The orange stones measure 10mm long and the length of the whole earring is about an inch (25mm). Any questions, just ask.

name: Cranberry Vine Earrings
description:
These beautiful and ususual earrings are made from vintage frosted glass leaves in turquoise, with little cranberry glass dangles on gold plated chain. The colours are brilliant together.

The leaves measure about 15mm (just over half an inch) long and the length of the whole earring is about 70mm (three inches). The earrings are gold plated.

name: Copper Swallow Locket
description:
This beautiful necklace features a genuine vintage brass locket that's tarnished to a beautiful golden patina. I have added a little vintage copper swallow in flight that contrasts brilliantly with the dark gold locket.

The locket measures 30mm across. The necklace chain measures 26" and is designed to be worn fairly long.

name: Seafoam Studs
description: These great vintage earrings are a milky turquoise glass. They measure 8mm across and are set in vintage brass settings. The earrings posts and backs are gold plated.

name: Arrow Earrings
description: These great earrings are brass arrows that measure about 40mm (an inch and a half) long. I have added simple gold plated ear wires.

name: Some More Seafoam Earrings
description: These great earrings are a milky turquoise glass. They measure 8mm across and are set in vintage brass settings. The earrings posts and backs are gold plated and the length of the entire earring is about 15mm (just over half an inch) long.

name: Triangle with Jet Earrings
description: These gorgeous earrings are in vintage geometric triangles with little jet black glass domes set in. They look great - geometric in an art deco kind of way. The black glass stones measure 7mm across. The length of the whole earring is around 65mm (almost three inches). The ear wires are gold plated. Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric or deco jewellery.

name: Hot Pink Triangle Earrings
description: These great earrings are fuscia pink triangles with gold plated chain and earrings. Each earring measures about two inches (50mm) long.

name: Frog Locket
description:
This adorable and highly detailed locket features a little frog that's been treated to bring out great verdigris tones of green and turquoise. The locket is vintage brass that's tarnished over time to a great antique gold colour.

The locket chain is 25" long so is designed to be worn fairly long. All my lockets have perfectly working clasps and space for two photos.

name: Southwestern Chevron Necklace
description:
This great pendant features five polished turquoise spikes in a graduated chevron shape. The pendant measures around two inches (50mm) wide and long. I have added gold plated chain.

This necklace is 20" long, so is designed to sit below the collar bone.

name: Concertina Deco Earrings
description: These great geometric earrings feature three interlinking diamonds in a great art deco design. The detail on the brasswork is fantastic. The earrings measure around 70mm (just under 3 inches) long and have gold plated ear wires. Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric or deco jewellery.

name: Bigger Scottish Thistle Locket
description:
This great necklace features a raw brass locket that's tarnished to a great deep gold colour. I have added a brass stamping of a thistle that's been treated to bring out deep tones of verdigris green and black. It contrasts brilliantly with the inlaid copper detail inside the locket.

The locket is 70mm (well over two inches) long with a perfectly working clasp. It's finished with some red brass chain that looks great with the coppery tones.

The necklace is approximately 28" so is designed to be worn long, below the chest.

name: Red Rosebud Ring
description:
This cute little ring features a vintage porcelain cabochon with a red rosebud on white background. I have set it in an antique gold lace edged setting, with a matching adjustable ring. It's a very delicate and beautifully detailed design with a lot of vintage charm.

The ring focal measures 10mm across. The ring is adjustable, so will fit anyone.

name: Blue Lighthouse Earrings
description:
These beautifully detailed stud earrings feature a lighthouse and anchor motif in a great Delft blue on white porcelain. They are vintage cabochons from the late fifties.

The earrings measure 10mm across and have gold plated ear posts.

name: Miniature Rabbit Brooch
description:
This great little brooch features a vintage illustration of a bunny rabbit in a garden. The image comes from a children's playing card from the fifties and is very charming.

It's encapsulated under a dome of clear resin and set in a gold lace edged frame / setting.

Measures 28mm high and 18mm wide.

I also do a version of this brooch in a bigger size, plus loads of other rabbit stuff.

name: Turquoise Swallow Brooch
description:
This little swallow brooch is a vintage brass stamping that I have treated and painted to bring out a gorgeous distressed turquoise patina.

The bird measures 50mm (two inches) by 25mm at its widest points.

name: Yellow Geometric Necklace
description:
This beautiful pendant features a geometric nugget of vintage lucite in a delicate pale yellow shade. I have strung it on a chain of vintage brass, with a slight reddish coppery tinge.

The focal measures around 25mm (an inch) across and is light as a feather to wear. The chain measures 22" (56cm) long.

name: Scallop Necklace
description: This super cool necklace is made from little vintage brass semi circles strung together to make a little scalloped pattern. They look a bit like lacy collars, except metal, so cooler. It looks brilliant on, and measures around 20" so is designed to sit on or around the collarbone. Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric designs.

name: Green Geometric Necklace
description:
This beautiful pendant features a geometric nugget of wood in a great forest green shade. I have strung it on a chain of vintage brass, with a slight reddish coppery tinge that goes brilliantly with the green.

The focal measures around 30mm (well over an inch). The chain measures 28" long.

name: Gold Rabbit Brooch
description:
This great rabbit brooch* is a vintage charm in a matte gold plate. He measures approx 40mm high and 28mm wide.

I have added a perfectly co-ordinating gold plated brooch back back. Any questions, just ask.

*he's either a muscley rabbit or a hare

name: Fools Gold Necklace
description: These pieces of Fool's Gold have been cut with clean, sharp lines on some sides, while others have been left uncut and natural for a great contrast of textures. The pyrite has a beautiful metallic sheen that glows gold when it catches the light. Each nugget is about 15mm so the necklace focal is about 50mm (two inches) across. The necklace measures 22" long so is designed to sit well below the collar bone, mid chest. Like this? Check out my Ribbed Copper Necklace.

name: Deco Geometric Earrings
description: I have made these great earrings from vintage brass stampings and little bars to create a modern, art deco style fan shape. The vintage brass has mellowed over time to a rich golden colour. The earrings measure about 70mm (just under three inches) long and have gold plated earring wires. Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric or deco jewellery.

name: Art Deco Shape Necklace
description: This great pendant is made from vintage brass cut into triangles and arranged to make a cool, art deco style pendant. I love it! The pendant is about 40mm (just under two inches) in length. The chain is gold plated and measures about 21" so is designed to sit mid chest, below the collar bone. Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric or deco jewellery.

name: Deco Triangle Earrings in Turquoise
description: These gorgeous earrings are in eighties geometric triangles with little turquoise glass domes set in. They look great - geometric in a vintage, art deco kind of way. The turquoise stones measure 7mm across. The length of the whole earring is around 40mm (about an inch and a half). They are vintage brass stamping, and light and comfortable to wear. The ear wires are gold plated french hooks. Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric or deco jewellery.

name: Deco Fan Earrings in Pink
description: These beautiful vintage charms are in an art deco modernist style, with five little opaque pink glass gems set in a simple fan shape. The brass settings are tarnished to a great bronze shade, which brings out the candy pink tones of the stones perfectly. These earrings measure around 50mm (two inches) long. I have added perfectly co-ordinating ear wires in antique bronze. Like this? Also available in other colours.

name: Terrier Dog Brooch
description:
This vintage brooch features a grey terrier Scottie dog with a rather thoughtful expression. I love it! It's made from vintage glass and I have set it in a antique gold lace edged setting.

The brooch measures 42mm high and 32mm wide.

name: Apple Necklace
description:
This fantastically detailed apple charm, with stalk and leaf, has a great antique gold patina. It is 3-d and hangs from a chain of perfectly co-ordinating bronze chain. The apple is solid, so has a great weighty feel to it.

The length of the chain is 28", so this necklace is designed to be worn long.  The apple measures around 30mm (well over an inch) in length.

name: Triangle with Opal Earrings
description: These gorgeous earrings are geometric triangles with little white opals set in. The glass opals have a gold sheen when they catch the light. The opals are vintage glass and measure 7mm across. The triangle pendants are vintage brass and the length of the whole earring is just under three inches (65mm). Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric designs.

name: Thistle Brooch III
description:
This cute little brooch is made from a vintage drawing of a thistle from old botanical prints. I have encapsulated it under a dome of glass before framing in a brass lace edged setting.

The brooch measures just 28mm high by 18mm wide. They look great on their own or in little clusters, so check out my other tiny brooches. I have other thistle ones!

name: Rhombus Necklace
description: This very cool geometric pendant is vintage brass with a wonderful aging and deep gold patina. I have added an antique gold chain. The pendant measures around 45mm long. The chain is 24" long. Like this? Then check out some of my other geometric designs.

name: Deco Greyhound Brooch
description: This pair of vintage greyhounds turn heads where ever they go. But so they should, because they're fabulous and they know it. The greyhounds are vintage lucite and are mounted on a gold plated brooch back. The brooch measures 68mm wide at its widest point. Also available in black. Like this? Then check out some of my other deco jewellery.

name: Dog Brooch
description:
This vintage brooch features a grey schnauzer dog with the most hilarious expression on his face. I love it!

The brooch measures 45mm high and 35mm wide. Any questions, just ask.

name: Lobster Locket
description:
This beautiful vintage necklace is made from an antique brass locket and lobster charm. The brass locket has a beautifully tarnished patina in a rich conker shade. The bronze, gold brass tones go brilliantly together for an authentic vintage look.

The locket measures around 30mm across. The chain measures 24" and is designed to be worn long.

name: Black Rabbit Brooch
description:
This little scampering hare is a brass stamping that's been painted with black and bronze paint for a cool vintage patina.

The brooch measures approximately 50mm across. Any questions, just ask.

name: Lion Head Brooch
description:
This fantastically detailed lion's head is a vintage brass stamping that I have treated to bring out beautiful tones of green, turquoise and blue.  Absolutely unique! 

The brooch measures 35mm wide.  

Any questions, just ask.

name: Horse Ring
description:
This cute little ring is made from a vintage button. It features vintage lucite with a metal horse head, and I have added a narrow bronze band. The ring focal measures around 15mm across and the ring's adjustable, so will fit anyone.

Any questions, just ask.

name: Blue Butterfly Brooch
description:
This cute little brooch is made from a drawing of a delicate blue butterfly from a vintage botanical print. I have encapsulated it under a dome of glass before framing in a brass lace edged setting.

The brooch measures just 28mm high by 18mm wide. They look great on their own or in little clusters, so check out my other tiny brooches.

name: Scottish Thistle Locket
description: This very cool necklace features an antique brass locket with a dark tarnished patina, and a little thistle charm in a co-ordinating antique gold with muted tones of verdigris green. The locket is 30mm across with a perfectly working clasp. It's finished with some thick chain in antique brass with a lobster clasp. Getting Married? I can supply these lockets for you to give as presents to your bridesmaids if given at least 6 weeks notice (more is better!). Just message me and we'll talk.

name: Stag's Head Brooch
description:
This cute little brooch is made from a vintage drawing of a stag's head. I have encapsulated it under a dome of glass before framing in a brass lace edged setting.

The brooch measures just 28mm high by 18mm wide. They look great on their own or in little clusters, so check out my other tiny brooches. 

I do a big version of this one, too.

name: Thistle Brooch II
description:
This cute little brooch is made from a vintage drawing of a thistle from old botanical prints. I have encapsulated it under a dome of glass before framing in a brass lace edged setting.

The brooch measures just 28mm high by 18mm wide. They look great on their own or in little clusters, so check out my other tiny brooches. I have other thistle ones!

name: Pig Brooch
description: This great pig brooch is a vintage brass stamping in gold. It measures about two inches (50mm) across and has a gold plated brooch back attached.

name: Thistle Brooch I
description:
This cute little brooch is made from a vintage drawing of a thistle from old botanical prints. I have encapsulated it under a dome of glass before framing in a brass lace edged setting.

The brooch measures just 28mm high by 18mm wide. They look great on their own or in little clusters, so check out my other tiny brooches. I have other thistle ones!

name: Librarian Locket
description:
This cute little vintage locket is antique gold with a perfectly working clasp.

I have added an antique bronze chain which is 22" (56cm) so this necklace is designed to be worn fairly long.

The locket measures 22mm (just under an inch). Any other questions, just ask.

* Getting Married? I can supply these lockets for you to give as presents to your bridesmaids if given at least 6 weeks notice (more is better!).  Just message me and we'll talk. *

name: Sea Shell Brooch
description:
This cute little brooch is made from a drawing of a turquoise seashell from a vintage botanical print. I have encapsulated it under a dome of glass before framing in a brass lace edged setting.

The brooch measures just 28mm high by 18mm wide. They look great on their own or in little clusters, so check out my other tiny brooches.

name: Horse Brooch
description:
This beautifully realistic horse brooch is vintage brass with a wonderful coppery bronze patina. The horse measures 45mm high and 40mm wide and has a gold plated brooch back attached.

Any questions, just ask.

name: For Meryl
description:
Trade Order 4 as per email 

With Next Day Special Delivery by 29th November

name: Gift Certficate
description:
This gift certificate will be emailed to you to print out/forward onto the person it is for. Remember to "add a note to seller" when paying through PayPal, or to contact me through this website to let me know the name of the person it is for, (and who it is from if it's not you)!

T&Cs:

This voucher can only be redeemed at www.silkpursesowsear.com. It cannot be exchanged for cash value, and can only be used once. You must spend at least as much as the voucher is worth in order to redeem it.
